alert.note: Alert for Christian; Moultrie; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Christian, southwestern Moultrie and northern Shelby Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moweaqua, or 13 miles northwest of Shelbyville, moving east southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Westervelt around 325 PM CDT. Findlay around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sullivan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
